overview_of_class: This course examines the role of ideas, interests, and institutions in the formation of public policy. While the focus is on the U.S. we will also examine variations in the policymaking process and outcomes across other industrialized democracies. The course will be focused around student research projects into a contemporary or historical policy issue.
name: Public Policy
title: WCAS POLI_SCI 328-0-20 Public Policy
